lines.text: I think I've been disfigured; or at least blinded.
Here it is, a Scot and a Jew haggling it out in the backyard of the synagogue.
Doubt is my bottom line. The only thing I don't doubt is my own doubt.
despair. Ecstacy. Despair. And I realized at that moment that I was now living the perfect yin and yang existence.
A Philippine Psychic Surgeon! Now why didn't I think of that?
